Grete Waitz (ne Andersen, 1 October 1953  19 April 2011) was a Norwegian 
marathon runner and former world record holder. In 1979, she became the first 
woman in history to run the marathon in under two and a half hours. She won 
nine New York City Marathons between 1978 and 1988, more than ... It was in 
1978 that her association with the New York City Marathon began;...
